heading: Thursday Night
text: Partly clear, then clouds increasing from the west after midnight. Lows from the upper 20s to low 30s west of the Greens, dropping into the 20s east of the Greens, with some teens in the cold hollows in the Northeast Kingdom. Light wind.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of wintry mix of snow over the higher hills in the north in the morning, then an increasing chance of more widespread rain showers through the afternoon. Highs in the 40s, nearing 50 in the warmer southern valleys, low 40s north. Wind turning south to southwest at 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Friday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of scattered rain showers, turning over to snow in the north and over the mountains. Lows from the upper 20s to low 30s. Light southwest wind.
